extendedInfo.description: The most advanced full-scaled multiplayer 3D RPG for Android has arrived in HD! The time has come to call for a hero. Join the battle in this epic RPG adventure delivered in stunning 3DFEATURES:MULTIPLAYEREarth And Legend features multiplayer mode as well as single player. Team up with a friend and experience co-op multiplayer. The multiplayer system allows players to tag team creatures and fight alongside each other while solving questsPETSEarth And Legend features the ability to own pets. Not only do pets make great companions but they also are trained to fight alone side their owner in combatCOMBAT SYSTEMEarth And Legend features 3 skill lines (Melee, Bow and Magic), which include a new and innovative combat system with real-time live action melee attacks and spell castingREAL NIGHT AND DAYEarth And Legend features a true in-game cycle of night and day on a 24 hour based time system. For every 24 minutes that the game is played, a full night and day cycle of 24 hours passes in the game worldWEATHER SYSTEMEarth And Legend features a highly advanced weather system. Depending on weather conditions, from time to time it will rain. In high altitude places it snows. A very strong rainfall will even produce thunder and lightning, which can be used by magicians. Some spells draw power directly from thunder and lightning, making the caster very powerful when it rainsADDITIONAL FEATURES- XPERIA PLAY Optimized [PlayStation Phone support]- Customize your character's race and gender- Prepare for battle with a variety of weapons, armor and items to choose from- 100% free roaming. Go anywhere at anytime- Shop for food or go fishing and catch it yourself- Full 3D freedom of movement plus 360 degree swimming- Camera panning and tilting with sensitivity control - Detailed side quests and challenging bosses to defeat- Balanced economy system. Visit shops. Buy and sell items- Right and left-handed joystick option- Customizable hot keys. Arrange skills in any order- 3 slots for multiple saved games- Multiple languages: English, French, and German_________________________________OTHER DVIDE ARTS GAMESCrusade Of DestinyÂ®Welcome To Hell_________________________________FUTURE UPDATE INFO, GAME TRAILERS AND NEWSWebsite:   http://wwww.dvidearts.comFacebook:  http://www.facebook.com/earthandlegendTwitter:   http://www.twitter.com/earthandlegendYouTube:   http://www.youtube.com/dvidearts

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: So far I\'m loving it. Great rpg game for a smartphone and the graphics are pretty good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good RPG
reviews.comment: Good game with lots to do, runs smoothly on my S3. Good effort!
reviews.author: David McCalmont

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Nice graphics and cool story. Hope this would be the standard when creating mobile games. Old school but very nice.!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very good game , i like it. Runs very good with very nice graphics worth the 6.99.. and you can do alot things there.
reviews.author: Edward Kaplan

reviews.title: Great Graphics and gameplay
reviews.comment: I enjoy a good RPG. Hope this is as much fun as bards tale, so far so good.
reviews.author: jeb rover

reviews.title: Rpg
reviews.comment: Cool. Could be better. But cool
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty cool game
reviews.comment: Igraphic is cool, its really easy to control your character and play, a lot of options and equip i really enjoy the game.
reviews.author: Pavol Regula

reviews.title: MORE
reviews.comment: more characters more customizable options costumes weapons ie mage class archer class and warrior class instead of just one more types of music more details more graphics more skills more powerful skills use imagination , more pets but dont have to buy them instead catch them why make everything good in game where the person playing has to buy it when they already bought game more places to visit more styles of architecture buildings just more even pets skills
reviews.author: Jordan Haskett

reviews.title: Needs more
reviews.comment: Easy to use, well worth the money, great graphics and game play also multiplayer so you can quest with others makes this game a must have! Need more updates though...higher level, higher level equips etc etc also a new map and more quests game is to short
reviews.author: Duane Brindley

reviews.comment: Great game. I had this game on my galaxy s3 but had to down grade to a smaller/cheap phone and it still works just as good.\tPlay this for hours
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No display...
reviews.comment: Was 1 star because it didn\'t work on either of my Jellybean 4.1 2 phones but since my HTC ONE got updated to 4.2 2, the game works great.
reviews.author: Dan Harvey

reviews.title: worth the effort
reviews.comment: Took about 4x and a reboot to install. Has been working so far. Graphics are what you would expect for a mobile RPG. Movement and camera actually works fluidly. Only 20 mins. So I\'ll have to revise
reviews.author: Sammy Santana

reviews.title: Overall good offline RPG!
reviews.comment: The controls are really easy, and unlike alot of 3D RPGs on the market you have the ability to pan the camera around your character. The inventory and menu is simple and easy to use. The graphics remind me of WOW (just with less detail obviously) I also love that you can be either gender and have pets (also 2 rare factors to find in android RPGs)  I have only just started but so far i am impressed! :)
reviews.author: Jamaica Taylor

reviews.title: It\'s really an awesome game!
reviews.comment: I like the way you equip the character with different equipment. Seems a lot like the firsts PS2 games. If you\'ve ever played zelda 64 ocarina of times, you\'ll love this game. The only downside though... Wish I could buy the other pets without having to spend additional $USD. Also wish there were more armors to update.
reviews.author: Juan Badillo

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Great game. Though challenging, keeps you busy for hours and hours. Better than most app games. 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Game is good, can be a bit buggy at times but mostly runs smooth. The graphics are great. Easy to pick up, a little hard to put down.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Its a great game. the contols are awsome and they are smooth and not glichy...but its easy to die and hard to attack ... Needs work
reviews.author: Hunter Thaxton

reviews.title: Best game ever!!
reviews.comment: Ive played it for 30 minutes and im hooked you really should buy this game the best graphics ive seen on a droid, as well as gameplay. A+++
reviews.author: Chase Bolling

reviews.title: over eager
reviews.comment: asked to rate the game within the first 30 seconds of play, well before I could have any opinion formed.   not a good sign
reviews.author: Shawn Grey
